name: A pictorial calendar to see the world​
body:
2017
A pictorial calendar to see the world​
Painting, installation. Eleven canvases of 22 x 20 cm, acrylic paint, push pins.


This work was created during the residency El Pasaje in Tafí del Valle, Tucumán, Argentina in December 2017. During ten days, I observed the landscape and took a photograph of it each day. With these images, I developed a system to synthesise in colours these images. A series of paintings was created out of the collected information.
